name: switch between multiple Docker CE versions
description: install and switch between multiple Docker CE versions

versions.description: list of Docker Engine versions, separated by comma

azureDnsAutoDetection.description: Allow automatically setting the dockerd DNS server when the installation script detects it is running in Azure

dockerDefaultAddressPool.description: Define default address pools for Docker networks. e.g. base=192.168.0.0/16,size=24

disableIp6tables.description: Disable ip6tables (this option is only applicable for Docker versions 27 and greater)
